### Bug Fixes

- [`777ddf43`](https://www.github.com/tauri-apps/tauri/commit/777ddf434a966966dc8918322c1ec9ee3f822ee2)([#8376](https://www.github.com/tauri-apps/tauri/pull/8376)) Unset `NSISDIR` and `NSISCONFDIR` when running `makensis.exe` so it doesn&#39;t conflict with NSIS installed by the user.
